alert.note: Alert for Clay; Fillmore (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 3:18AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Clay and Fillmore Counties through 345 AM CDT... At 317 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sutton, or 23 miles southwest of York, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Shickley around 330 AM CDT. Geneva around 335 AM CDT. Strang around 340 AM CDT. Milligan and Ohiowa around 345 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
